name: luxeshop-monorepo
description: A production-ready fullstack e-commerce solution featuring a modern React frontend, robust Express/Prisma backend, and AdminJS panel.
author: LuxeShop Team

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "API,CLIENT,ADMIN" -c "blue,green,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix api" "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run dev --prefix admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix api && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix admin
